name: cypress-cucumber-boilerplate
description: This project is meant to be a kind of template to start working with Cucumber and Cypress just cloning the project.

scripts.cypress:runner: cypress open --env allure=true && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && rm -r allure-results/ allure-report cypress/screenshots|| true || allure open
scripts.cypress:generate-report: cypress run --env allure=true && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && rm -r allure-results/ allure-report cypress/screenshots|| true || allure open

author: cucumber
